<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

### isOriginalEndpoint() {#a6b388f6ec0c78d81a2d54efaac443691}

  prototype={<>bool SplitAnalysis::isOriginalEndpoint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Idx) const</>}>
isOriginalEndpoint - Return true if the original live range was killed or (re-)defined at Idx.

Idx should be the &#39;def&#39; slot for a normal kill/def, and &#39;use&#39; for an early-clobber def. This can be used to recognize code inserted by earlier live range splitting.

</MemberDefinition>

### shouldSplitSingleBlock() {#af3bf010ee796ca57e04c495963fd49b7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SplitAnalysis::shouldSplitSingleBlock (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo">BlockInfo</a> &amp; BI, bool SingleInstrs) const</>}>
shouldSplitSingleBlock - Returns true if it would help to create a local live range for the instructions in BI.

There is normally no benefit to creating a live range for a single instruction, but it does enable register class inflation if the instruction has a restricted register class.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="BI">The block to be isolated.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="SingleInstrs">True when single instructions should be isolated.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/splitkit-h/#l00233">233</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/splitkit-h">SplitKit.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/splitkit-cpp/#l01587">1587</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/splitkit-cpp">SplitKit.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
